name: Spore
description: When you are targeted by a melee attack, you can use your reaction to release a spore that attempts to put your attacker to sleep. The creature must make a CON save against your Move DC, falling asleep on a fail.

effect.name: Badly startles all of the other Pok√©mon to act before the user.
effect.effect: All Pokemon that acted before the user must make CHA Saving Throws against Intimidation/Persuasion DC.
